about.age_and_location: I'm 23 years old and I'm based in Brazil
about.work_duration: I've been working as a software developer since 2018.
about.download_resume: Download my resume or check my accounts!

viewb.description: Worked with a BI product that allowed users to create dashboards and analysis that helped executives making critical business decisions. I had participated in the software development end-to-end using: Angular, Spring, Postgres and Linux for servers. Customer service was another skill I earned by working at this company
viewb.full_stack_desc: By the time I was promoted the second time, I was already working on client's infrastructure, offering support for them and I had already tackled almost every part of the system.
viewb.junior_full_stack_desc: I was promoted to Junior after a thorough study of the company's software. New responsibilities were assigned to me and I got used to the flow.
viewb.intern_desc: I started my journey as a programmer here, learning the very basics of Spring Boot and Angular.

up_outsourcing.description: At Up Outsourcing I was given the opportunity to improve my soft skills besides the deeper aknowledge I acquired on Front End and PHP. It has been a great experience to work with so many different people and across so many distinguished projects.
up_outsourcing.front_end_desc: My job as a Front End developer was a milestone in my career. For the first time I was responsible for only one part of the software, what gave me an opportunity to deepen my skills in React.
up_outsourcing.full_stack_desc: Following up on my journey, I ended up working professionally, for the first time, with PHP using the Laravel framework. I worked on a couple of older projects that used PHP but this is one, is the longest I've worked with PHP.
up_outsourcing.web_analytics_desc: For a long time, it has been my dream to work on a big project with so many different areas and it came true at Up. Working as a Web Analytics Engineer opened my eyes to a whole new area that I hadn't prior knowledge about. I'm still on the learning process though.

simple_dashboard.description: Using a dribbble layout as a base I made this simple dashboard using Glassmorphism technique. I really liked the result.

flipping_cards.title: Flipping Cards
flipping_cards.description: I saw a flipping card like this on a website and I decided to implement it myself. It was pretty fun to toy with the perspective CSS property.

thousand_weeks.description: It gave me a new perspective on time management.
